content: Created a GitHub Actions CI workflow at `.github/workflows/ci.yml` that runs lint/compile, example schema validation, `pytest`, and benchmark reproduction checks on Python 3.11/3.12, uploading captured logs as artifacts whenever a job fails.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('.github/workflows/ci.yml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: ["**"]
  pull_request:

permissions:
  contents: read

concurrency:
  group: ci-${{ github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true""",
"""jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    timeout-minutes: 30
    strategy:
      fail-fast: false
      matrix:
        python-version: ["3.11", "3.12"]

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: ${{ matrix.python-version }}
          cache: pip

      - name: Install dependencies
        shell: bash
        run: |
          set -euxo pipefail
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          if [ -f requirements-dev.txt ]; then
            pip install -r requirements-dev.txt
          elif [ -f requirements.txt ]; then
            pip install -r requirements.txt
          elif [ -f pyproject.toml ]; then
            pip install -e ".[dev]" || pip install -e .
          else
            pip install -e .
          fi
          python -m pip install pytest""",
"""      - name: Prepare artifact directory
        shell: bash
        run: |
          set -euxo pipefail
          mkdir -p ci_artifacts

      - name: Lint + compile
        shell: bash
        run: |
          set -euxo pipefail
          python scripts/ci_lint_compile.py 2>&1 | tee ci_artifacts/lint_compile.log

      - name: Validate example schemas
        shell: bash
        run: |
          set -euxo pipefail
          python scripts/validate_examples_schema.py 2>&1 | tee ci_artifacts/schema_validation.log

      - name: Pytest
        shell: bash
        run: |
          set -euxo pipefail
          pytest -q 2>&1 | tee ci_artifacts/pytest.log

      - name: Benchmark reproduction check
        shell: bash
        run: |
          set -euxo pipefail
          python scripts/bench_repro_check.py 2>&1 | tee ci_artifacts/bench_repro_check.log

      - name: Upload failure artifacts
        if: failure()
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: ci-artifacts-py${{ matrix.python-version }}
          path: ci_artifacts/
          if-no-files-found: ignore
          retention-days: 14"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created a GitHub Actions CI workflow at `.github/workflows/ci.yml` that runs lint/compile, example schema validation, `pytest`, and benchmark reproduction checks on Python 3.11/3.12, uploading captured logs as artifacts whenever a job fails.
